[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@contract-case/test-equivalence-matchers](./test-equivalence-matchers.md) &gt; [strings](./test-equivalence-matchers.strings.md)

## strings namespace

## Classes

| Class                                                                       | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| --------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [AnyString](./test-equivalence-matchers.strings.anystring.md)               | Matches any string.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| [Base64Encoded](./test-equivalence-matchers.strings.base64encoded.md)       | <p>Transformation matcher that matches a base64 encoded version of the given string or string matcher</p><p>WARNING: Since many strings are accidentally decodable as base64, this matcher is best combined with a more restrictive string matcher (eg <code>StringifiedJson</code>).</p> |
| [StringContaining](./test-equivalence-matchers.strings.stringcontaining.md) | Matches any string that contains the given substring.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| [StringifiedJson](./test-equivalence-matchers.strings.stringifiedjson.md)   | <p>Transformation matcher that matches a JSON.stringify()ed version of the given object.</p><p>For example, if the actual data is the string:</p>                                                                                                                                         |

```
"{\"foo\":2}"
```

<p>then you could match it with:</p>
```
StringifiedJson({
  "foo": 2
})
```
<p>or</p>
```
StringifiedJson({
  "foo": AnyNumber(2)
})
```
 |
|  [StringPrefix](./test-equivalence-matchers.strings.stringprefix.md) | Matches any string that begins with the given constant string prefix |
|  [StringSuffix](./test-equivalence-matchers.strings.stringsuffix.md) | Matches any string that ends with the given constant string suffix |
